scripts.build:safari: VITE_BROWSER=safari vite build && VITE_BROWSER=safari APP_FILE=popup vite build
scripts.build:firefox: VITE_BROWSER=firefox vite build && VITE_BROWSER=firefox APP_FILE=popup vite build
scripts.build:firefox-android: VITE_BROWSER=firefox-android vite build && VITE_BROWSER=firefox-android APP_FILE=popup vite build
scripts.build:chrome: VITE_BROWSER=chrome vite build && VITE_BROWSER=chrome APP_FILE=popup vite build
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:chrome && web-ext run --source-dir ./dist/chrome --target=chromium --start-url https://globalprivacycontrol.org --start-url https://global-privacy-control.glitch.me
scripts.test:ff-desktop: npm run build:firefox && web-ext run --source-dir ./dist/firefox --target=firefox-desktop --start-url https://globalprivacycontrol.org --start-url https://global-privacy-control.glitch.me
scripts.test:ff-android: npm run build:firefox-android && web-ext run --android-device=emulator-5554 --source-dir ./dist/firefox-android --target=firefox-android  --firefox-apk org.mozilla.firefox --start-url https://globalprivacycontrol.org --start-url https://global-privacy-control.glitch.me
